mapper.select: select e.id, e.title, qe.answer from questionnaire q, questionnaire_entry qe, question_entry e where q.is_deleted = 0 and qe.is_deleted = 0 and e.is_deleted = 0 and q.id = #{questionnaireId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and q.id = qe.questionnaire_id and qe.entry_id = e.id

select p.id, p.start_time, p.end_time from questionnaire q, questionnaire_period qp, time_period p where q.is_deleted = 0 and qp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0 and q.id = #{questionnaireId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and q.id = qp.questionnaire_id and qp.period_id = p.id
